pages.text: 11|118|Ara apanara raba icche karale samasta manusake eka jati karate paratena, kintu tara paraspara matabirodhakari'i raye geche [1].

11|119|Tabe tara naya, yaderake apanara raba daya kareche ebam tini taderake ejan'ya'i srsti karechena. Ara ‘ami jina o manusa ubhaya dbara jahannama purna karaba'i’, apanara rabera e katha purna hayeche [1].

11|120|Ara rasuladera ai saba brttanta amara apanara kache barnana karechi, ya dbara amara apanara cittake drrha kari, era madhyame apanara kache eseche satya ebam muminadera kache eseche upadesa o smarana.
11|121|Ara yara imana ane na taderake baluna, ‘tomara sba sba abasthane kaja karate thaka, amara'o kaja karachi.
11|122|‘Ebam tomara pratiksa kara, amara'o pratiksa karachi. ’

11|123|Asamanasamuha o yaminera gayeba allahara'i malikanaya ebam tamra'i kache sabakichu pratyabartana karano habe. Kaje'i apani tamra ibadata karuna ebam tamra upara nirbhara karuna. Ara tomara ya kara se sambandhe apanara raba gaphila nana [1].
12|2|Niscaya amara eta nayila karechi [1] kura'ana hisebe arabi bhasaya, yate tomara bujhate paro [2].
12|3|Amara apanara kache uttama kahini barnana karachi [1], ohira madhyame apanara kache e kura'ana pathiye; yadi'o era age apani chilena anabahitadera antarbhukta [2].
12|4|Smarana karuna, yakhana ‘i'usupha tara pitake balechilena, ‘he amara pita! Ami to dekhechi egara naksatra, surya ebam camdake, dekhechi taderake amara prati sijdabanata abasthaya [1].’
